hero.name: Arlet
hero.description: Experienced web developer with deep expertise in JavaScript, React, TypeScript, and Node.js. I specialize in creating smart, responsive, and custom web systems with focus on optimal user experience and SEO optimization.

about.name: About Me
about.title: Full Stack Developer Specializing in Smart Solutions and AI
about.content:
As an experienced web developer with deep expertise in JavaScript (ES6+) and the leading technology stack of React, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB (MERN Stack), I specialize in creating smart, responsive, and custom web systems and websites. I combine strong development capabilities with deep understanding of user experience (UX/UI) and search engine optimization (SEO) to deliver comprehensive and leading digital solutions.

Proven Expertise:
‚Ä¢ Advanced Full-Stack Development: Building robust architectures and seamless integration between frontend and backend
‚Ä¢ React & TypeScript: Creating dynamic and intuitive user interfaces with secure and maintainable code
‚Ä¢ Node.js & Express & MongoDB: Developing strong and secure API servers
‚Ä¢ WordPress Customization: Developing custom templates and plugins

I am committed to delivering digital solutions that generate real business value, while maintaining technological excellence, efficiency, and reliability.

project1.title: E-commerce Platform
project1.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with payment integration, user authentication, and admin dashboard.

project2.title: Task Management App
project2.description: A responsive task management application with drag-and-drop functionality and real-time updates.

project3.title: Portfolio Website
project3.description: A customizable portfolio template for developers to showcase their work and skills.

moving-quote.title: üöö Smart Moving Quote System
moving-quote.description: The application, built with React and TypeScript, offers an innovative solution for moving companies and logistics service providers. Through a simple and user-friendly interactive form, customers fill in their moving details, and through a smart calculation mechanism, a personalized quote is received immediately - without the need for human response. The system is based on up-to-date technologies, secure, responsive, and designed to provide a smooth and professional user experience. The system is suitable for integration into moving company websites, existing applications, and customer management interfaces (CRM), enabling sales process optimization and increased customer satisfaction.

residents-management.title: üè¢ Smart Resident and Payment Management System
residents-management.description: Our system, based on React, Node.js, and TypeScript, enables simple, secure, and efficient management of residents and payments. With an intuitive interface, advanced management dashboard, and high-level security, the system provides a complete solution for building committee management, resident payments, and receipts, while monitoring performance and ensuring maximum data security. Smart tools for user authentication, access control, and real-time monitoring ensure your community stays organized, secure, and easily managed.
